description: Ginger is one of the best budget hotel with 98 self-sufficient rooms and all the special features of Smart Basics™ such as Smart space™, Safe zone™, Meeting Room, Gymnasium geared to make your stay comfortable and pleasant. All rooms are equipped with amenities such as Mini-fridge, LCD TV, Self-controlled A/c, Tea and Coffee maker and Telephone.
address: Ginger, Vasant Mahal Road, Near Nazarabad Police Station.
